backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the CareerSphere backend, defining data types (CareerPath, DegreeProgram, UserProfile, etc.) and implementing user profile management, quiz result storage, and bookmarking with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files, describing each page/component's purpose, responsive design details, and notable implementation specifics.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme tokens including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the CareerSphere React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with 15 routes, sets up React Query with 5-minute stale time, and renders the router alongside a Toaster notification component.
frontend/src/components/DeleteUserConfir: Alert dialog component that confirms permanent deletion of a user profile by principal, invoking the useDeleteUserProfile mutation and closing on success.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer displaying a 2026 copyright notice, five social media icon links, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking based on the current hostname.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Full-page layout wrapper that stacks Navigation, a main content Outlet, and Footer in a flex column filling the viewport height.
frontend/src/components/ModuleCard.tsx: Card component for a feature module that displays an icon, title, description, and an Explore button that navigates to the specified route on click.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar component for CareerSphere that renders desktop and mobile nav links, highlights the active route, and conditionally shows a Profile or Login link based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/UserDataCard.tsx: Card component for displaying a summary of a user's data (principal ID, latest quiz result, bookmarks) with View and Delete action buttons.
frontend/src/components/UserDetailsModal: Modal dialog that shows full details of a user profile including principal ID, quiz results with stream badges, and bookmarked careers and degrees.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin operations: fetching all user profiles from the backend and deleting a user profile by principal, with toast notifications on success or error.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Custom React Query hooks for backend interactions including submitting quiz results, fetching user profiles, and managing career/degree bookmarks with mutation and query patterns.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties using OKLCH color values for a blue-purple gradient design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Static About page displaying the platform's mission, vision, and problem statement using icon-decorated cards in a responsive layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that fetches and displays all user profiles in a table with options to view details or delete users via modal dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/CareerPath.tsx: Career exploration page where users select a subject to view related career paths with degrees and exams, supporting bookmark toggling for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Chatbot.tsx: Simple rule-based career guidance chatbot page with a chat UI that responds to keywords about careers, subjects, and entrance exams with simulated bot replies.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: A contact page with a validated form (name, email, message) and contact information display (email, phone, address). On successful submission it shows a confirmation and resets the form after 3 seconds.
frontend/src/pages/DegreeFinder.tsx: A searchable list of Indian undergraduate degree programs with bookmark functionality, requiring Internet Identity login. Uses React Query hooks to fetch user profile and add/remove bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/FutureMap.tsx: A static visual roadmap page showing four career journey stages (School Subjects → Degree → Career Path → Dream Job) with responsive desktop timeline and vertical mobile layout.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: The landing/home page featuring a hero section with logo, tagline, and navigation buttons, followed by a features overview section highlighting the platform's key offerings.
frontend/src/pages/IndiaVsAbroad.tsx: An interactive comparison page that contrasts studying/working in India versus abroad across four categories (cost, ROI, lifestyle, job opportunities) with expandable score bars and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page supporting Internet Identity authentication and traditional login (unimplemented demo). Shows logged-in state with principal ID, logout option, and benefits of signing in.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Modules listing page that displays a grid of 8 career guidance tool cards, each with an icon, title, description, and navigation path.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: User profile page that requires authentication, displaying the principal ID, latest Stream Selector quiz results, and bookmarked careers with a logout option.
frontend/src/pages/StreamResult.tsx: Displays the recommended academic stream (Science, Commerce, or Arts) after the quiz, showing relevant subjects, career options, and a description based on the stream query parameter.
frontend/src/pages/StreamSelector.tsx: Multi-step quiz page with 5 questions to determine the best academic stream for a student, submitting results to the backend if authenticated and navigating to the result page.
frontend/src/pages/SubjectToCareer.tsx: Informational page for the Subject-to-Career AR Explorer feature, displaying feature cards and a coming-soon notice for the interactive AR experience.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist values in sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations for a CareerSphere design system.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 37) for CareerSphere, documenting existing features, known issues (logo display, quiz data persistence, missing module routes), and high-level architectural notes for the career guidance web platform.
